title: Didn't Get Graded For My Last Game
body:
I didn't get graded for my last game, probably 
because it was went the client got wacky for everyone.
I was hoping for my last token for Janna but I'm not 
sure If I got an S or not. It's not a big deal if I didn't but 
I thought the game went particularly well.
Also I wasn't able to honor anyone and 
I really wanted to honor the ADC because they were great. 
Any chance for getting graded and/or being able to honor someone still?
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: I really wish we could help here, but we have absolutely no control over game stats and adjustments.  We did have some major issues on NA earlier this afternoon.  It's likely that your match saved to our match history, but the info didn't get sent up to the ranked or mastery server.  As a result, the win or grade wouldn't have been received.  :(  I am sorry about that.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=WE1hm7LM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-16T23:22:18.094+0000)
>
> I really wish we could help here, but we have absolutely no control over game stats and adjustments.  We did have some major issues on NA earlier this afternoon.  It's likely that your match saved to our match history, but the info didn't get sent up to the ranked or mastery server.  As a result, the win or grade wouldn't have been received.  :(  I am sorry about that.

That's ok, thanks though!
